posts.post_content:
Started off with nearly a set-and-a-halfs worth of 09 Obaks and now I'm down to just five.  All are in the very affordable range but most of these are still very nice....

Prices include shipping and scans are available upon request.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Bumping these with lower prices and a "combined" discount! Priced to sell quickly!

t212-1 1909 Obak Carrol VG but measures short (handcut) --- $50
t212-1 1909 Obak Christian VG (handcut) --- $75
t212-1 1909 Obak Howse GD couple tiny wrinkles --- $75
t212-1 1909 Obak LaLonge VG (handcut) --- $75
t212-1 1909 Obak D. Lewis VG no wrinkling...two very tiny spots of tobacco staining on reverse --- $75
t212-1 1909 Obak Orendorff PR (handcut) wrinkles, small notch in border --- $35
t212-1 1909 Obak Whalen FR ...significant vertical crease --- $45


Or, take all 7 cards for an exceptionally low price of $375 delivered!!

Hi- Any interest in trading ? I think I have some either Goudey or Playball dupes. Also some 50's Topps stars?
Let me know. Thanx, Steve

Hi Steve,

Thanks for the note.  My collection is strictly WWI and earlier unfortunately, so I'd prefer trades to be from that genre.  However I'd definitely make an exception if the Goudey or Playballs are of the error/printing goof variety :)

Thanks for the interest....

Brian

Sold a couple and now down to just five.  Any takers on the few that remain?


t212-1 1909 Obak Carrol VG but measures short (handcut) --- $50
t212-1 1909 Obak Christian VG (handcut) --- $75
t212-1 1909 Obak Howse GD couple tiny wrinkles --- $65
t212-1 1909 Obak LaLonge VG (handcut) --- $75
t212-1 1909 Obak Whalen FR ...significant vertical crease --- $40

**** All cards now sold...thanks everyone! ****
